overview:
Jeff McNeill is an entrepreneur, Internet marketing and ecommerce consultant, and American expatriate living in Chiang Mai, Thailand. In 2009, Jeff co-founded Lanna Innovation Co., Ltd. (à¸šà¸£à¸´à¸©à¸±à¸— à¸¥à¹‰à¸²à¸™à¸™à¸² à¸™à¸§à¸•à¸à¸£à¸£à¸¡ à¸ˆà¸³à¸à¸±à¸”) a registered Thai Limited Company with Pattara Suttajit (à¸ à¸±à¸—à¸£à¸° à¸ªà¸¸à¸—à¸˜à¸ˆà¸´à¸•à¸•à¹Œ).

Lanna Innovation Co., Ltd. (à¸šà¸£à¸´à¸©à¸±à¸— à¸¥à¹‰à¸²à¸™à¸™à¸² à¸™à¸§à¸±à¸•à¸à¸£à¸£à¸¡ à¸ˆà¸³à¸à¸±à¸”) is the premier print, web and mobile publisher of Thai language and culture for the foreign market. Lanna Innovation products are distributed at over 180 locations in Thailand and have shipped to 11 countries internationally (October, 2010).

Jeff McNeill is also the principal at SEO Chiangmai, the Internet marketing division of Lanna Innovation. He consults in search engine optimization, search engine marketing and ecommerce. He has been consulting in corporate IT since 2000 and in Internet marketing since 2005.

From 2002-2009, Jeff taught courses at the University of Hawaii in several fields including information technology and marketing. From 1994-2000 Jeff worked in industry, managing global corporate IT networks.

In 2001 Jeff earned a Masters in Information Management and Systems from UC Berkeley, where he previously earned his Bachelors degree in Interdisciplinary Studies in 1994.
